childhood_flix.title: The Lion King
childhood_flix.description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after his evil uncle frames him for his father's death.

childhood_flix.title: Home Alone
childhood_flix.description: An 8-year-old boy is accidentally left behind when his family flies to Paris for Christmas.

childhood_flix.title: Toy Story
childhood_flix.description: A cowboy doll feels threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as a boy's favorite toy.

childhood_flix.title: Sofia The First
childhood_flix.description: This is a story about a young girl whose life suddenly changed after her mother married a king.
